body: I think I understand. It looks like the coordinator is passing an unadorned Change-ID to the set review API, but according to https://gerrit-review.googlesource.com/Documentation/rest-api-changes.html#change-id, this only works if the Change-ID is unique. That isn't true in this case, so you have to pass either a numeric ID or the fully unique `<project>~<branch>~<Change-ID>` tuple.
